!
! QTech Switch Configuration
!
hostname QTECH-DC-SW01
!
service timestamps log datetime
service timestamps debug datetime
!
username admin privilege 15 password encrypted abc123hash
!
vlan 1
 name default
!
vlan 10
 name SERVERS
!
vlan 20
 name MANAGEMENT
!
interface TFGigabitEthernet 0/1
 description Uplink-Core
 switchport mode trunk
 spanning-tree portfast disable
!
interface TFGigabitEthernet 0/2
 description Server-01
 switchport mode access
 switchport access vlan 10
!
interface TFGigabitEthernet 0/3
 description Server-02
 switchport mode access
 switchport access vlan 10
!
interface Vlan 1
 ip address 10.0.0.3 255.255.255.0
!
ip route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 10.0.0.254
!
line console
 login local
!
line vty 0 4
 login local
 transport input ssh
!
end
